name: Siege Gunner
descriptionText: Aiming outsized siege weapons poses little difficulty for you.
benefitText: You take no size penalty for aiming a directfire siege weapon larger than yourself. If you operate an indirect-fire siege weapon and miss, you misdirect fire by 1 square per range increment.
normalText: Direct-fire weapons impose a -2 attack roll penalty per size category by which the weapon is larger than the creature aiming it. An indirect-fire weapon that misses misdirects fire by 1d4 squares per range increment.
